instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2330 logic board battery
threads.message: I was working on this board and had to remove one cap that's very near the little battery it has. Guess what's happened when the battery got hot? Exploded, of course. So now I need to find a replacement but can't get to know which exact model and where to find it. Will attach one pic of the lil' bastard so you guys can give one direction. The battery is oddly named 'SUPERCAP' on the scheme.

threads.title: 820-2330 logic board battery
threads.message: Not needed, it is only to keep the time when you remove the battery.
